text: You Damn Rightlast.fm | Black Diamond Heavies | You Damn Right EP was self- released in 2004 by the Nashville, Tennessee rock band Black Diamond Heavies.all music | Black Diamond Heavies | You Damn Right EP This album features John Wesley Myers as lead vocalist and on the keyboard, Van Campbell on the drums and Mark "Porkchop" Holder on guitar and harmonica.
